function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Emission of VOCs from common products into the indoor environment","Impact":"Degrading occupants' health","Mitigation":"Use of low-VOC or VOC-free products, improved ventilation, and air filtration systems","Technologies":"Low-VOC products, advanced ventilation and air filtration systems","People":"Occupants","Owner":"Building owners and property managers"},{"Description":"Sub-standard building conditions in low-income and minority households","Impact":"Contributing to health disparities between low-income and high-income households","Mitigation":"Improving housing quality, addressing pest infestation, repairing ventilation systems, and providing affordable housing options","Technologies":"Pest control measures, building maintenance and repair, affordable housing solutions","People":"Low-income and minority households","Owner":"Government, housing authorities, and non-profit organizations"}]}
